cinimaticCaption.caption: CUTTER: Captain's Report - February 4th, 2531.
Five years. Five long years.
That's how long it took us to get Harvest back.
At first, it was going well...
...then setback after setback...
...loss after loss...
...made what was going to be a quick and decisive win...
...into five years of hell.
Of course, that's all Harvest is today...
...it's hell down there.
But now it's ours again.
EPSILON INDI SYSTEM - HARVEST FEBRURAY 4TH 2531
20 YEARS BEFORE THE HALO EVENT
CUTTER: Serina. Status?
SERINA: Standard orbit achieved. All systems normal.
CUTTER: Prep for pod launches. Bring weapon systems online.
SERINA: Expecting trouble, Captain?
CUTTER: Harvest may be ours again,
but I don't think the Covenant appreciate that yet.
Sergeant Forge. Report.
FORGE: Definitely plenty of bad guys down here, Captain,
and they've found something in the ice.
CUTTER: Damn it! That complicates our mission. Anders, what have you got?
ANDERS: Captain, scans of the northern polar region
show some interesting Covenant activity on the surface.
There's some kind of structure down there.
SERINA: What do you think they are looking for?
CUTTER: That's what we're here to find out.
We're to bring Alpha Base up to operational status
and take control of that site.
ANDERS: I'll get my equipment ready, Captain.
FORGE: Lady, there's no way you're coming down here on the first bird.
CUTTER: Sergeant Forge, pull back to Alpha Base.
I'm sending you some backup.
FORGE: Roger that. Forge out.
SERINA: So... nothing too difficult, then?
CUTTER: It might be the key to this whole war, Serina.
It's worth the risk.
